lead_paragraph: Katie McGregor, the 2005 United States 10,000-meter champion, will make her marathon debut at the New York City Marathon on Nov. 5. McGregor, 29, joins a women’s field that includes Deena Kastor of the United States, the 2004 Olympic marathon bronze medalist; Jelena Prokopcuka of Latvia, the defending champion; and Catherine Ndereba of Kenya, the 2004 Olympic marathon silver medalist.
